column4: Hi, I'm trying to sort out a problem of no sound with the browser if the media player is open, and no sound with the media player if the browser is open and has played sound. Can someone help me?
do you know what sound card you have?
I'm not certain
which media players have you tried?
maybe try OSS with http://packages.ubuntu.com/jaunty/flashplugin-nonfree-extrasound ? no guarantees :)
thanks, taking a look
sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree-extrasound  ?
looking for the audio chip, the board is a GA-P35-DS3L
who is the manufacturer?
Realtek ALC888
Magnesium, no other thoughts?
did pulse work for regular audio?
yes
this is a common problem, or one only for my chipset?
there is likely some workaround, unsure what it might be though
so flash worked okay with pulseaudio?
ah ok, so flash audio did not work at all with pulseaudio
well, I suspect if I had closed the media player, it would have worked
its just hard because maybe pulseaudio was not working with flash at all
I really should have tried to use pulse seperatly..I did not
yeah check the same thing with alsa
